lead_paragraph: Months before he manages his first game with the Los Angeles Dodgers, Joe Torre is going for a victory at Hollywood Park. Night Chapter, owned by Torre’s Diamond Pride stable and trained by the Hall of Famer Bobby Frankel, drew the No. 6 post in the field of 10 for Saturday’s $150,000 Hollywood Turf Express, a Grade 3 race.
